light_cloud_description: Zhi Qingyun is an ultra-lightweight, enterprise-grade streaming computing platform. One-click deployment and ready to use. It enables rapid deployment of Flink jobs, visual job scheduling, custom interfaces, custom forms, data dashboards, and more. Empower enterprises to analyze real-time data and unlock greater business value.
light_cloud_description_mobile: Zhi Qingyun is an ultra-lightweight, enterprise-grade streaming computing platform. One-click deployment and ready to use. It enables rapid deployment of Flink jobs, visual job scheduling, custom interfaces, custom forms, data dashboards, and more.
job_types_supported: Supports a wide range of job types, including FlinkSql, FlinkJar, JdbcSql, Prql, Python scripts, Bash scripts, Curl scripts, API calls, and more.
job_orchestration: Job Scheduling, Drag in Any Direction
job_support: Supports full job lifecycle instructions, including run, stop, interrupt, offline, publish, rerun, rerun downstream, rerun current, external calls, and more.
real_work_description: Supports various resource scheduling platforms such as Kubernetes, Yarn, CDH, Apache Hadoop, Flink Standalone, Flink Cluster, and more.
data_drives_value: Streaming Computing for More Efficient Data Analysis
data_drives_value_description: Collaborate with Zhi Qingyun to implement an enterprise-grade streaming computing platform.
multi_platform_description: Highly flexible API definitions supporting diverse request and response structures to meet complex scenario requirements.
data_view_description: Powerful data processing and visualization technologies transform complex data into intuitive charts, supporting real-time monitoring and analysis to assist enterprises in efficient decision-making.
opensource_value: Open Source for Enterprise Streaming Computing Exploration
